InventoryCntProdtBatchItem.name: InventoryCntProdtBatchItem
InventoryCntProdtBatchItem.description: Represents the inventory count of a batch of a product at a location.

InventoryCountAssessment.description: Inventory count assessment associated with the inventory count product batch item.

ProductBatchItem.description: Product batch item associated with the inventory count product batch item.

InventoryCountProductItem.description: Inventory count product item associated with the inventory count product batch item.

ActualStartDate.description: Actual start date and time for counting the batch's inventory.

ActualEndDate.description: Actual end date and time for counting the batch's inventory.

IsBlindCount.description: Indicates whether the expected inventory quantity is visible to the assignee during inventory counting (true) or not (false).

ActualQuantity.description: Actual quantity of the batch's inventory.

ExpectedQuantity.description: Expected quantity of the batch's inventory.

Status.description: Status of inventory count product batch item.

DiscrepancyReasonType.description: Specifies the type of reason for discrepancy between actual quantity and expected quantity.

Comment.description: Comment, note, or instruction that gives additional context for the count of the batch's inventory.

IsSerializedProduct.description: Indicates whether the product being counted is serialized (true) or not (false).

ProductionBatch.description: Production batch associated with the inventory count product batch item.

Product.description: Product associated with the inventory count product batch item.

ProductItem.description: Product item associated with the inventory count product batch item.

LocationOwner.description: Owner of the location associated with the inventory count product batch item.

Location.description: Location associated with the inventory count product batch item.

DiscrepancyInQuantity.description: Indicates whether there's a discrepancy between the actual quantity and the expected quantity (true) or not (false).
